instrupy.util.SyntheticDataConfiguration¶

class instrupy.util.SyntheticDataConfiguration(sourceFilePaths=None, geophysicalVar=None, interpolMethod=None, _id=None)[source]¶

Class to handle configuration of synthetic data.

Variables

  • sourceFilePaths (list, str) – List of filepaths of the science-data files in NetCDF format. Each file corresponds to a specific (forecast/analysis) time.

  • geophysicalVar (str) – Geophysical variable (name as present in the source NetCDF file) to be used for the synthetic data.

  • interpolMethod (instrupy.util.SyntheticDataConfiguration.InterpolationMethod) – Interpolation method to be employed while spatially interpolating the source data onto the pixel-positions.

  • _id (str) – Unique identifier.
